query:
SELECT 'conversations' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM conversations
UNION ALL
SELECT 'messages', COUNT(*) FROM messages
UNION ALL
SELECT 'knowledge_articles', COUNT(*) FROM knowledge_articles
UNION ALL
SELECT 'enneagram_analyses', COUNT(*) FROM enneagram_analyses
UNION ALL
SELECT 'subscriptions', COUNT(*) FROM subscriptions
UNION ALL
SELECT 'stats', COUNT(*) FROM stats
UNION ALL
SELECT 'users', COUNT(*) FROM users;
